entry.title: Sunday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low plus 2. Wind chill minus 3 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High 7. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Rain. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning in the evening. Fog patches developing near midnight. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming east 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Sunday 30 April 2023
